name: Nova Wars
description:
Nova Wars is a multiplayer arcade game by #GreenTeamGG for #FamiliarGameJam6.

Destroy your opponent's galaxy by hitting its planets and star... with heavenly bodies!

Player one: use Q, A, Z to select one of your planets and its target, X to use your Solar Storm and be ready to press S in the events!
Player two: use O, K, M to select one of your planets and its target, N to use your Solar Storm and be ready to press J in the events!

Events:
-Comet: the red, fastest and deadliest comet of the Galaxy! Be the first to press your event key to destroy an enemy planet.
-Supernova: a burning, fluorescent ball. Press the event key as much as you can to send the Supernova to destroy ruin your enemy galaxy!
-Green Fog: created just to bother you... you're welcome!
#arcade
